DOC.criteria: Male 18 40 year , inclusive 55 95 kg , inclusive Evidence clinically significant disease History cancer History syncope severe vasovagal event Antibiotic treatment within 60 day Day 1 Surgical procedure within 60 day Day 1 Hepatitis C , Hepatitis B Tuberculosis HIV Requirement medication ( prescription/OTC ) study Donated > 250 mL blood within 30 day Day 1 Donated > 750 mL blood within 60 day Day 1 In clinical trial immunosuppressive drug within 6 month Day 1 Received vaccination within 6 month Day 1 Any clinically important allergy Known allergy/sensitivity lactose and/or polyethylene glycol
